subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Spain’s David Ferrer beat Mardy Fish, 7-5, 7-6 (3), 5-7, 7-6 (5), on Sunday to clinch a victory for Spain over the United States in a Davis Cup quarterfinal.
snippet: Spain’s David Ferrer beat Mardy Fish, 7-5, 7-6 (3), 5-7, 7-6 (5), on Sunday to clinch a victory for Spain over the United States in a Davis Cup quarterfinal.
